revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Hexen|Weapon}} '''A_FAxeAttack'''
(''no parameter'')
Works similarly to [[A_FPunchAttack]] except the additional power comes from the presence of ammo instead of the special1 counter. The special1 counter is still set to 0 when there is no hit however. In addition, the range for this attack is 2.25 times the normal melee range giving 144 units. Damage will range from 40-62 points of damage which is doubled if ammo is present. With ammo {{Class|AxePuffGlow}} is used, otherwise {{Class|AxePuff}} is used. When powered, the victim is pushed back with a strength of six otherwise there is no thrust. If the player runs out of ammo through this call, the function will jump to the Fire+5 state. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|FWeapAxe}} and derived classes.
